title: Queen of Fire
description: Veena Tarwen is a mole. After a brilliantly orchestrated public display of her rare power over fire, she was summoned by the ruling Houses of Vhalka and made to enroll in the Mage Academy to become their perfect little soldier, in other words a pawn. She smiled in front of the nobles and appeared subservient while behind them, she plotted their downfall and leaked important secrets to the rebellion. At the Academy, she meets the enigmatic son of the Supreme Ruler, Torren Elton, who throws her off balance. He ignites feelings within her she never expected to have. She struggles with juggling her unique new friendships, pressure from the Court, spying on the nobles and her blossoming feelings for Torren, If she wants to survive and claim back her throne, Veena shall have no choice but to become the Queen Of Fire.
author: Cassie   James
